summary: As a little help for a friend I'm showing how to merge important factions in different mods to ensure that they work together. PDF file with text and images.
descriptionHtml:
[b]- Description -[/b]

A simple PDF document with pictures showing how to manually patch Rigmor of Bruma, Falskaar, Undeath and USKP factions to ensure that they work alongside one another. This guide can be used for any other record or combination of mods, this is merely a guide of how to merge records manually.
[b]
- Requirements -[/b]

A PDF reader![url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32988/?]
[/url]
[b]- Installation -[/b]

Unpack the contents of the zip file to anywhere you'd like and open the file in your favorite PDF reader!

[b]- Uninstallation -[/b]

Delete the zip file and the PDF file!

[b]- Changelog -[/b]

1.0 - Initial sloppy release.

[b]- Credits -[/b]

Thanks to the TES5Edit team for creating this wonderful tool as well as to all the modders out there making the game so wonderful to play!

[b]- Permissions -
[/b]
You can post this anywhere you like as long as I am credited as the creator. If you improve on the guide, please send me a copy to be hosted here as well.
author: DigitalVixen
